job-request-accepted-body: Your application for {job_title} has been accepted !
job-request-confirmed-body: Your shift is over, give the code {verification_code} to your employer.
job-request-finished-body: Your application for {job_title} has been finished !
job-request-confirmed-employer-body: {user_name}'s shift on {job_title} is over, validate their code in the app before letting them go !
creation-room-body: A employer wants to chat with you !
